metadata.name: We Rise Together
metadata.description:
A collaboration by Katrina Tang & Kristjan Järvi featuring Kristjan's original arrangement Ascending Swans.  
 

Part of a charity fundraising event "Art Against War" that has one goal and one goal only - to SUPPORT Ukraine!  
100% of the proceeds will go to the foundation COME BACK ALIVE.  
https://savelife.in.ua/en/donate.


Kristjan Järvi has earned a reputation as one of the canniest, and most innovative composers in the classical scene (REUTERS). As a conductor, he is at home on big international stages, directing great classics from Wagner to Tchaikovsky, from Steve Reich to Radiohead as well as his original pieces (kristjanjarvi.com).


Katrina Tang is an Estonian artist who uses photographic medium to chase children's colorful nature and sincerity. Tang has worked on a number of international well known children's brands and publications including Gucci, The Times, Harrods and many more.  
Her visual for comes from years ago, portraying sisters Marianne and Mariette (katrinatang.com).
